title: Good Omens Cast Respond to IGN Comments
author: IGN
comment: God I love Michael Sheen and David Tent
Boy, I sure do love *looks at smudged writing on hand* Gollum and David Tent
I can't believe David Tennant has caught up with technology enough to know what FFS means.
I love the friendship that's formed between David Tennant and Michael Sheen.

“There’s someone else I look like now! I should take that as a compliment.”

“Well, it- i-i-i mean, pphHH”
description:
IGN comments are funny, knowledgeable, passionate... and sometimes pretty weird. We showed the cast and creators of Good Omens some of our favourites.
